Referenced by Schema_Implicite_Multi_TimeStep_base::mettre_a_jour().

{
  double rap                   = 1.2;
  int    nb_ite_sans_accel_max = 20000;

  if (residu_old==0)
    {
      residu_old=residu_;
      nb_ite_sans_accel_=0;
    }
  else if ((residu_old>rap*residu_)||(nb_ite_sans_accel_>nb_ite_sans_accel_max))
    {
      facsec_*=sqrt(rap);
      residu_old=residu_;
      facsec_=min(facsec_,facsec_max_);
      nb_ite_sans_accel_=0;
    }

  nb_ite_sans_accel_++;
}
